Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 202 of 262 1913
LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross
1 A. Correct.
2 Q. Because you saw it in your flight log; right?
3 A. Correct.
4 Q. But that entry only has the first name that is the same as Jane's true first name; correct?
5 A. Correct.
6 Q. It doesn't say Jane's first and last name; right?
7 A. That's correct.
8 Q. Now, you were actually interviewed by the FBI several times about the flights you flew for Epstein; right?
9 A. Once, that I recall.
10 Q. Well, isn't it true that you were interviewed the first time by the FBI way back in August of 2006; isn't that correct?
11 A. Yes, I recall that.
12 Q. That, you were not asked about Jane at that interview?
13 A. No.
14 Q. Now, the next time you were interviewed, it was by the government, right, meaning the prosecutors were there, as well?
15 A. Yes.
16 THE COURT: Please wait until the question is finished and then answer. Go ahead.
17 Q. So that interview with the prosecutors was almost 15 years later on February 7th, 2020; isn't that right?
18 A. Repeat the question.
19 Q. The first time you were interviewed by the prosecutors in
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00019064
